title: Start Simple
content: Begin with your core user flows (login, checkout, etc.). Starting with the most critical paths helps you understand how AutoTester works with your application and ensures your most important functionality is covered first.

title: Use Descriptive Names
content: Clear recording names help AI generate better test cases. Use names that describe what the user is doing, like 'User Login Flow' or 'Checkout Process' rather than generic names like 'Test 1' or 'Recording A'.

title: Test One Feature at a Time
content: Focus recordings on specific functionality rather than trying to test multiple features in one session. This approach makes it easier to identify issues and helps the AI generate more targeted and effective test cases.

title: Review AI Suggestions
content: Customize test cases to match your requirements. While AutoTester's AI provides intelligent suggestions, you know your application best. Review and refine the generated test cases to ensure they align with your specific testing goals.
